pma:database.name: namaz-vakitleri
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `hicri` ( `hicri_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `hicri_date` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_turkish_ci NOT NULL, `hicri_title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_turkish_ci NOT NULL, `hicri_dateshort` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_turkish_ci NOT NULL, `hicri_miladiuzun` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_turkish_ci NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `hicri_id` (`hicri_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=373 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_turkish_ci;
